name: Towers Go Rogue
description:
Towers Go Rogue is a tower defense game where you need to watch out for your towers going rogue!

With each kill tower is partiallytaken by AI when control reach 100% you lose control of the tower and it will attack you!

Each upgrade increase amount of kills before tower is lost.

- You can build few types of towers

- Each tower can upgrade its damage and range

LMB - action

RMB - cancel

R - restart

Esc - quit
